Subject: Activation function

Hi all,

Firstly, I apologise in advance for the "newbie-ness" of the questions I'm going
to ask...

I see that Ken's code uses a floating point sigmoid activation function, I was
hoping to get a little more explanation about the choice of the value for the
slope?

Additionally I was just wondering is there any benefit from using 
other types of activation functions, with selection being under the 
control of the GA? (Also the same question applied to the activation function
slope)

I'd be interested also to hear if anyone has experimented optimising the
generation of the input to the activation function by using SIMD etc
instructions. I'm guessing that using default compiler setting won't use these
optimisations (?), but it should have the potential to speed things
considerably?  

Thanks
Daniel
